PrecisApproval of an amendment made by the NATIONAL ENERGY BOARD to Gas Export Licence GL-276 issued to CoENERGY TRADING COMPANY which reduces the maximum daily quantity of gas that may be exported pursuant thereto, in accordance with N.E.B. Order AO-1-GL-276.
